scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix back-end" "npm run dev --prefix front-end"
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build --prefix back-end" "npm run build --prefix front-end"
scripts.lint: concurrently "npm run lint --prefix back-end" "npm run lint --prefix front-end"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix back-end && npm install --prefix front-end
